reviews.text: The minestrone resembles more of the regional ‚Äòboranija‚Äô, but it was clearly well prepared in the kitchen. For the main course, I asked the waiter to put something together for me. He suggested a duo of pasta, one with chicken and the other with spicy beef. It was excellent, just like the service.

So me and my Fiancee post alot of reviews on our travels and give our honest opinion of everything and anything that we do.

So me and my Fiancee are in Podgorica, Montenegro üá≤üá™ on Holiday from our home in Manchester, England üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å•Û†ÅÆÛ†ÅßÛ†Åø and we are staying in an Airbnb in the local area.

So today as we headed out for the day we walked past Restaurant Per Sempre so decided to pop in for Breakfast, We were warmly greeted by a host who sat us at a table for two.

For drinks my Fiancee ordered an Americano with hot milk and I opted for a Cafe Latte and a glass of freshly squeezed Orange Juice, Drinks were well presented and tasted delicious.

A few minutes later the waiter returned and we were ready to order, So my Fiancee ordered an prosciutto ham omelette with a side salad and I opted for the Big Breakfast(Chicken Sausages, Spinach scrambled eggs, Chips and a lovely mustard dip).

My Fiancee loved her Prosciutto omelette it was cooked perfectly, it was very light and fluffy and the portion size was very generous and she couldn't finish it.

My Breakfast was very well presented and again tasted delicious, The meal was a very generous portion and the food was delicious, I especially enjoyed the Scrambled eggs with Spinach.

The service was exceptional, The food was excellent, Lovely decorated interior, Polite and Friendly staff, The Restaurant was spotlessly clean and excellent value for money.

We Highly recommend Restaurant Per Sempre.

5‚òÜ

If you want impecable food, great service and clean ambience - go here. The mushroom pottage is splendid, I always eat the pasta here because it is one of the best in Montenegro. I really hope they will NOT change anything in the near future, because it is amazing as it is - including the prices.

Wow wow wow!
Of the best restaurants in all Montenegro,specially for Italian cuisine!So tasty & fresh.Very kind and professional service.Mushroom soup must,spaghetti delicious,tasty white wine,home bread,risotto.All was delicious!10 stars from me & my wife

Best place with Italian kitchen in Montenegro, Serbia and Bosnia. Level of service just amazing. If you want to know the taste of delicious boiled coffee with crem brul√©, or have huge size delicious breakfast or home made pasta - that's the place. Top level waiters would give you feeling that you are an important guest. Im travelling a lot and this place it my pilgrimage spot every time im in Podgorica or even near
